full_threads.body: @heath Just gonna close this one

Hi Amy, 

Hope you had a good weekend. 

Confirming we have these updates ready to go and will push them to live outside of hours.
@joel I have some more context on this one now. We can chat about it if you like? Thanks

HEATH MAGUIRE CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271 Begin forwarded message: From: Amy Smith <amy@huntleyandco.com.au> Subject: FW: A couple of things.... Date: 4 July 2019 at 12:57:09 pm AEST To: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au> Hello, Just following up on the wall mounted TV's that we were discussing in the email below.
  • Prop TV's
·
  • Can we please show 2 x options for prop TVs (freestanding and wall mounted).
  • Can we please also have these pre populated so client don't need to "select them". They currently say "select in showroom" but we store them in the warehouse.
Kind Regards Amy Smith AMY SMITH CEO - HUNTLEY + CO E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au P. 02 8310 2285M. 0421 515 854 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU From: Amy Smith <amy@huntleyandco.com.au> Date:Tuesday, 11 June 2019 at 2:40 pm To:WP Perk Support <support@wpperk.com> Subject:Re: A couple of things.... Hello, Welcome back! I hope you had a great time away. The TV's are the same product, they just get adjusted depending on the need. It's much easier if we know before we deliver so we can modify them in the warehouse. Can we assign this the same way we would say a table lamp (i.e. the system doesn't need to know how many we have in order to "select"). The SKU's for both products will be the same. In terms of the changes, it looks like the bed images haven't been uploaded yet. Is that correct? Kind Regards Amy Smith AMY SMITH CEO - HUNTLEY + CO E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au P. 02 8310 2285M. 0421 515 854 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Amy, 

Sorry I didn't get a chance to call you today, was in and out of meetings. 

If you are working tomorrow feel free to give me a buzz. I will be in the office all day.

Legend. Thank you.


Have you got a sec to chat about some web design stuff for D2P?



Kind Regards

Amy Smith




AMY SMITH CEO - HUNTLEY + CO

E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au

P. 02 8310 2285 M. 0421 515 854 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Amy, 

Just confirming the bed images are loading now, screen shot attached. Also, the Prop TV's and Beds won't show up in the showroom PDF now.

Hello,


Thanks for this. The images I was referring to was on the parent catalogue page (as in if you look at Bedroom Furniture and then Beds). Can we use the images there too please.


Also, beds and prop TV's seems to be showing up on the showroom items PDF that I print for clients when they come in to select their accessories. Can we remove it from there please?


Kind Regards

Amy Smith

AMY SMITH CEO - HUNTLEY + CO

E. amy@huntleyandco.com.auP. 0421 515 854| 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Amy,

Regarding the bed images. All good now on this one. Please see the attached.

We will get back to you on the TV stuff part.

Hello,


Welcome back! I hope you had a great time away.


The TV's are the same product, they just get adjusted depending on the need. It's much easier if we know before we deliver so we can modify them in the warehouse. Can we assign this the same way we would say a table lamp (i.e. the system doesn't need to know how many we have in order to "select"). The SKU's for both products will be the same.


In terms of the changes, it looks like the bed images haven't been uploaded yet. Is that correct?



Kind Regards

Amy Smith




AMY SMITH CEO - HUNTLEY + CO

E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au

P. 02 8310 2285 M. 0421 515 854 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Amy, 

The below tasks have all been done. We just need some clarification on the prop tvs. With the current 16 SKU's that we have, are those either a wall mount or free standing? Or is it more a case of a different bracket is sent depending on the requirement?

@heath ok cool! I can set this up. Can you ask Amy which sku ids she want for the free standing and wall mounted? 
https://huntleyandco.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=6881&action=edit

Hope that make sense

@joel yes, the stylist needs to be able to pick one or the other when they are creating their quote and then it can be preselected during the Selection Phase. So I guess it would need to be at the category level. Thanks

@heath All good now on this one. For the bed and prop tvs "Pre selected".

Just not sure on the freestanding and wall mounted. Do I need to create another catalogue category for that?

Hi Amy, 

The below have all been done. The only one outstanding is:

"Is it possible to use the styled images on the main site for the child categories too please?"

Perhaps we can have a quick chat about this one at some point. I'm a little confused. 

Thanks and speak soon,

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hello,

I hope you are well.

Just checking in regarding a couple of things for the website:

  • Beds
    • Can we please add bed images in to the beds in the catalogue, they seem to be missing.
    • Also, can we have these prepopulated in the selection phase so clients don't need to "select them".
  • Prop TV's
    • Can we please show 2 x options for prop TVs (freestanding and wall mounted).
    • Can we please also have these pre populated so client don't need to "select them". They currently say "select in showroom" but we store them in the warehouse.
  • Images
    • Is it possible to use the styled images on the main site for the child categories too please?
  • Gallery
    • Can we please add the gallery page (i.e. full insta feed) on the public site, the same way we have it on the main site.


If I can do any of these things please let me know how to do them so I don't need to bug you about them again!


Thank you.

Kind Regards
Amy Smith

AMY SMITH
CEO - HUNTLEY + CO

E. AMY@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

P. 02 8310 2285
 M. 0421 515 854
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU
